original_text: Then Jesus went to Bethany, and he visited Simon at his house. At one time, Simon had had a bad disease of the skin. While Jesus was eating a meal there, a woman came into the house. She brought a small stone jar that contained expensive oil with a very nice smell. They used nard to make it. The woman broke the jar to open it. Then she poured the oil over Jesus' head.
korean_text: 예수께서 베다니 나병환자 시몬의 집에서 식사하실 때에 한 여자가 매우 값진 향유 곧 순전한 나드 한 옥합을 가지고 와서 그 옥합을 깨뜨려 예수의 머리에 부으니

sentences.original_text: and he visited Simon at his house
At one time, Simon had had a bad disease of the skin
While Jesus was eating a meal there
a woman came into the house
She brought a small stone jar
that contained expensive oil with a very nice smell
sentences.korean_translation: 그 안에는 아주 좋은 향기가 나는 값비싼 기름이 들어있었습니다

sentences.original_text: They used nard to make it
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그것을 만드는 데 나드를 사용했습니다

sentences.original_text: The woman broke the jar to open it
Then she poured the oil over Jesus' head
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 기름을 예수님의 머리에 부었습니다
